ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: M.T. and C.L. were partially supported by NOAA Modeling, Analysis, Predictions and Projections (MAPP) Program Grant NA14OAR4310223. S.J.C. acknowledges support by NOAA MAPP Grants NA15OAR4310154 and NA16OAR4310079. We’d like to thank the Climate Model Inter-comparison Project and the National Center for Atmospheric Research’s Large Ensemble Project for providing the climate model outputs used in this study.
